text:
Hi all!
Im trying to make my hubdb dynamic pages appear in my sitesearch modules results, any one got any idea how to make that happen? Currently it just shows the overall webpage, but i need it to search through the dynamic pages too.
Any help would be much appreciated

Hello guys,
I'm looking into the documentation about image_email default module <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/default-modules#image-email-> but I am unable to find that module in the design manager.
How can I find that module, I would like to be able to see the code of that particular module
